title: If we are trying to think of new idea for game modes.....
body:
Two ideas, one is ok the other would just be used as a medium for abuse.
1 -  Somehow have enough keys on your keyboard to have all the summoner spells at your disposal. Same cooldowns etc, just everyone has all of them. Even revive and clarity etc. This would be a fun alternative and let a few more stategys imerge. 5 smites. 5 exhausts etc

2 -  Allow the champ select screen to have an all chat option. Obviously this has no game play value just a pyschalogical challenge of champ baiting or flat out abuse.

Thoughts.

TDS
